name: Talking Dog Max - Virtual Pet
description:
He barks and growls! He dances and howls! But what he loves the most is talking to YOU! Jump on an awesome 3D ride with Talking Dog Max and join thousands with virtual pets! This free talking game will make you laugh as you pet, poke, tease and dress up Max, the silly talking dog.

▶ ▶ ▶ “My little brother says the dog in the Hawaiian shirt and hat looks just like our uncle! lol Works pretty good for my 5-year-old sis,” a user's commentary. ◀ ◀ ◀

You want a pet, but don't have enough time to take care of it? Problem solved! Get Talking Dog Max and you will have a doggy which will play with you and talk back to you. The only care you'll have to do is clean your screen once in a while. Easy, right?! And the best thing about it is that it's completely free of charge.

The game is simple, thus suitable for the little ones, teens and the big ones. Dressing the dog up encourages kids' creativity and as for the older ones, it is a great pastime entertainment. Download Talking Dog Max and check out what he can do!

BOUNCE
Swipe the screen up, down, left or right to see the dog bounce in different directions.

DRESS UP
Press the dress up icon on your screen and make your dog look casual, intellectual, Santa Claus-like and many others. Once you've chosen your favorite outfit, you may change the background too, to make it more suitable for the attire.

TALK
If the dog has a paw on his ear, he is ready to listen to you. Talk to Max and he will repeat everything you say in a funny voice.

GROWL AND BARK
Swipe the screen diagonally over the dog's body to hear him growl and bark.

DANCE
Press the dog icon at the bottom left corner of the screen to see your dog dance.

PLAY CATCH
Press the bone icon on your screen to play catch with the dog.

Talking Dog Max is one of those talking apps you will want to keep. With his silly looks and moves, it will soon become your best play friend! Download Talking Dog Max and get that pet you've always craved for!
